patthana17.32:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasavitakkasavicāro
patthana17.32:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe
patthana17.32:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naavitakkavicāramatto
patthana17.32:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe
patthana17.32:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
